name: Bonafind
description: A Simple Business Searching/Reviewer Site that you can log in and do a CRUD operation on reviews of your favorite businesses.Everybody can add a store in the and comment their experiences on it. React for the frontend.PostgreSQL & NodeJS on the Backend

name: Sickfits
description: A feature-rich online shopping store where you can sell buy & sell items. Has a very simple receipt/permissions section. React with Server side rendering and  Apollo for the frontend. NodeJS, Graphql-yoga and Prisma on the backend.

name: Now thats delicious
description: A feature-rich NodeJS application that lets you post a store and get reviews on it!. It can display all the reviewed stores in a static map and show where the store is located in the world! Made in PugJS templating language for the View. MongoDB and Express is used on the backend

name: Foodie Fun
description: A simple CRUD web app where you can create/read/update/delete food experiences and share with people! Made in React for the frontend. Postgresql,NodeJS and Express on the backend
